text:
meet with some Publications Committee members
on this? And is there something we can do or
suggest with regard to membership—especially
getting new Individual Members? Perhaps this
could be done cooperatively with the Membership
Committee—or at leas t with Lew Rhodes, the
Vice Chairman in charge of Individual Members.
(He seems quite eager and cooperative.)
Anyway, even if I don't have any answers, I've
got some questions!
Thanks again for sending along the materials,
and I hope to see you soon -
Best
